alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Iowa; Johnson; Jones; Linn; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:53PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Linn, eastern Iowa, northwestern Washington, northern Cedar, southwestern Jones and Johnson Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 652 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mount Vernon to near Conroy. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mount Vernon and Lisbon around 700 PM CDT. Mechanicsville around 705 PM CDT. Oxford around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Tipton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 220 and 255. Interstate 380 between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cedar; Iowa; Johnson; Jones; Linn; Washington
